post.body: You did it first. The religious baker who wanted to be left alone, you just had to attack him and scream in his face and force him to bend to your demands. Maybe, just maybe, they wouldn't associate such negative attributes with gays if you didn't constantly shove it in their face. No, *you* pushed them over the edge, to scorning it and now to wanting to criminalize it. No one hated black people until you who falsely speak for them burned and looted Minneapolis for days straight. Thanks to *you*, now they really are racist, because you made them think this is what black people do. Maybe they wouldn't be so uncomfortable with trans people if it weren't for you fighting mostly for access to the womens' bathroom for people who still have a penis, athletes blatantly cheating by switching to the weaker team, and unbelievable college snowflakes freaking out about because someone dared "assume their gender". And then you pushed it even further, and now you've got them insisting that everyone follow defined gender roles and wanting to repeal the 19th. Maybe they would even be willing to get along you, but you said no, and there's definitely no going back now. Think about it, if a bunch of crazy people are constantly screaming about something relentlessly, you're going to start loathing said thing, even if you otherwise would've loved it. And those crazy people are what you are. Good job, you've managed to turn half the country against everything it once believed in to destroy you and everything you've made them associate with you. But hey, at least you can pull out your precious victim card, which was probably the plan all along!

The correlation is again too strong to ignore and I'm tired of being nice to these people only for them to fly off the handle and stab me in the back.  My life is too short to see if one of them is one of the "good ones".

But hey, at least you can pull out your precious victim card, which was probably the plan all along!

parent.body:
can you be more specific in what you're trying to understand about it?

basically imagine the government we have now, but each department becomes a business or allows some businesses to do what the government is doing

I just want a Christian conservative government, it can be ancap or monarchist, both can work to varying degrees

whatever problems and solutions you see with government often exist in similar ways in anarcho-capitalism

for example, how will we deal with abortion? Well, the State currently allows abortion in the U.S., so it's not like the government has succeeded in preventing abortion. So you might say then, well we just need a good government, and the same would be said of ancap: we would just need good governmental businesses. And so on.

body:
> The late 90s/early 00s was the transitionary period, but 20 years before that, the US was much more conservative. Alan Turing is probably one of the more prominent examples of persecution gays faced.

Alan Turing was the UK, not the US. Sodomy was "illegal" in *parts* of the US but that was probably taken about as seriously as the law against singing in the bathtub. Also that wouldn't be a conservative position because it promotes strong government control and lack of individual autonomy.

> Gays are massively over represented among child molesters.

This is true and it makes sense that someone who is abnormal in one way will also be in another way. But you're painting it as if they're ALL pedos *and* can't control themselves enough to not molest kids.

> Trannies are largely groomers and are hugely interested in inducting more people into their cult.

Them wanting to force business owners to let them into the women' bathroom is just as bad. But there are two types, and if it weren't for the SJWs screaming about "bigots" nonstop no one would support this kind.

> LGBT as a whole has a huge grooming problem with how they want their propaganda in regular programming (example: the drag queen that got onto Nick Jr and Blues Clues).

Those are more SJWs and CEOs trying to make money by acting trendy than groomers.

> And when they're not doing that, they're being insufferable in other ways like begging to be 'hit' so they can claim persecution and wild more power, like in the infamous baker cake and ball waxing cases.

The screeching libtards who probably aren't even for real and just want attention yeah. The rest you don't even notice.
body_html:
The late 90s/early 00s was the transitionary period, but 20 years before that, the US was much more conservative. Alan Turing is probably one of the more prominent examples of persecution gays faced.

Alan Turing was the UK, not the US. Sodomy was "illegal" in parts of the US but that was probably taken about as seriously as the law against singing in the bathtub. Also that wouldn't be a conservative position because it promotes strong government control and lack of individual autonomy.

Gays are massively over represented among child molesters.

This is true and it makes sense that someone who is abnormal in one way will also be in another way. But you're painting it as if they're ALL pedos and can't control themselves enough to not molest kids.

Trannies are largely groomers and are hugely interested in inducting more people into their cult.

Them wanting to force business owners to let them into the women' bathroom is just as bad. But there are two types, and if it weren't for the SJWs screaming about "bigots" nonstop no one would support this kind.

LGBT as a whole has a huge grooming problem with how they want their propaganda in regular programming (example: the drag queen that got onto Nick Jr and Blues Clues).

Those are more SJWs and CEOs trying to make money by acting trendy than groomers.

And when they're not doing that, they're being insufferable in other ways like begging to be 'hit' so they can claim persecution and wild more power, like in the infamous baker cake and ball waxing cases.

The screeching libtards who probably aren't even for real and just want attention yeah. The rest you don't even notice.

parent.body:
"The closet" was a thing because being openly gay was not well tolerated.  The late 90s/early 00s was the transitionary period, but 20 years before that, the US was much more conservative.  Alan Turing is probably one of the more prominent examples of persecution gays faced.  The left has recently pivoted from, "Cancel culture doesn't exist" to "cancel culture was originally the right's weapon and this is the pendulum" and it's hard to deny this accusation, except that it makes it clear that the left just wants to exercise the same abuse of authority and not "do better".

The very good reason is all around us today.  Gays are massively over represented among child molesters.  Trannies are largely groomers and are hugely interested in inducting more people into their cult.  LGBT as a whole has a huge grooming problem with how they want their propaganda in regular programming (example: the drag queen that got onto Nick Jr and Blues Clues).  And when they're not doing that, they're being insufferable in other ways like begging to be 'hit' so they can claim persecution and wild more power, like in the infamous baker cake and ball waxing cases.  There's much more to cover on this topic, but ultimately I'd recommend browsing ruqqus and voat more to see for yourself rather than rely entirely on an essay that I don't care to write and doubt will be well read.

> It does not refer to two men attempting to have "sex", a biological impossibility between two of the same sex.

ROFL. There are about a million websites on the internet that will prove that it's not a biological impossibility. People do it every single day. Dogs do it. Dolphins do it. Ducks do it. Even hedgehogs do it. Homosexual sex is one of the most natural things in the world, the list of animals that don't have gay sex can be counted on the fingers of one hand.

That's like saying it's impossible to mix milk products and meat products in the same food, another thing which the Bible bans. Or to eat shrimp, which the Bible also bans. Or to have a tattoo, which the Bible also bans. Or to mix two different fibres in the one cloth, also banned.

Imagine thinking that something as natural as that is wicked, all because some savages wandering around in the desert cutting off the foreskin of their boy children had some sexual hangups.

Tattoos: **banned**. Eating shrimp: **banned**. Cotton/nylon mixed clothes: **banned**. Cheese burgers: **banned**. Women talking in church: **banned**. Men with deformities being a preacher: **banned**.

Lot tells a group of strangers to gang rape his daughters, that's not banned, God approves of gang-rape so much that Lot is declared the only moral and godly person in Sodom and Gomorrah. And this is the vile poisonous shit you think is morality?

parent.body:
"Plenty" is a vague term. I remember a KKK 'rally' where (I use that term loosely because) like 20 freaking people showed up. That was back in the 90's, early 2000's. Except for a few fringe groups, racism was DOA in the U.S... until the Left and CRT brought it back... with a vengeance. It started with the OJ trial, and that wasn't the fault of White People. 99.9% of white people in the U.S wanted to convict OJ Simpson because he was so obviously and blatantly guilty no one with even half a brain could have said otherwise. Black people made it into a Race Thing--Not Whites. White people wanted him convicted because he was Guilty and murdered 2 people in cold blood, and his actions had nothing to do with the color of his skin--Black people wanted him exonerated because...he was Black. No deductive reasoning need apply, no evidence meant anything. He was black so he should get off for killing a (white) woman. 

Over the past 5+ years I've come to be very wary of Blacks---and with damn good reason. I never judged them by the color of their skin---but damned if they didn't judge me by Mine. I never chose White person in any situation because they were White--but damned if Blacks didn't support/defend other Blacks simply because they were Black. I never destroyed a friendship or back-stabbed a co-worker or friend because they were Black--but damned if Blacks didn't destroy *my* friendship and backstab me because I was a White. I never judged someone on the color of their skin, rather than the content of their character....until I was judged for my "white" appearance. 

Blacks CAUSED this shit. Unequivocally they CAUSED whatever is happening now. 

I still don't Hate black people. But I sure as fuck don't trust them anymore. I know as well I know my own name if I were the only White out with a group of black friends, and a BLM/Antifa mob came around a corner, or a bunch of gang bangers, and started attacking Me for the color of my skin..... my black "friends" would dump me in a heartbeat and leave me to die. To Black people skin color is Everything, and they will defend a black person (even a woman beating, pregnant woman stabbing low life criminal) before they would defend me---a person who fought at their side in literal combat, who defended them, who stood up for THEM.....Oh yeah, they'd fuck me over in a heartbeat just because the people attacking me were Black, too. 

So do not sit there and act like Black people are innocent victims of some vast conspiracy. They aren't. If racism is rising it's because BLACK people made it about racism and harped on it, and fucked over anyone they could who wasn't black, and even demanded "Black Privilege" ...... Not because Whites in America were Racist....but because THEY Were.
